bridge-type.label: SimpleBinary UART Bridge
bridge-type.description: Represent gateway for devices connected through UART interface.

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: UART port address

parameter.name: baudRate
parameter.label: Baud rate
parameter.description: Communication speed [bits/s]

parameter.name: pollControl
parameter.label: Poll control
parameter.description: Communication type. In OnScan mode all data are reading cyclically. In OnChange mode only new data are sent to openHAB (default).

parameter.name: pollRate
parameter.label: Poll rate [ms]
parameter.description: Determine period of data read from device.

parameter.name: forceRTS
parameter.label: Force RTS
parameter.description: Communication port force RTS pin activation

parameter.name: invertedRTS
parameter.label: Invert RTS
parameter.description: Invert RTS pin state

parameter.name: charset
parameter.label: Code page
parameter.description: Define code page for communicated strings (e.g. ISO-8859-1, cp1250). If blank or wrong code page is defined, system code page is used.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Response timeout [ms]
parameter.description: How many miliseconds should wait for answer.

parameter.name: degradeMaxFailuresCount
parameter.label: Timeout to degrade device
parameter.description: How many attempts to establish connection before device is put off-scan. Zero means no off-scan.

parameter.name: degradeTime
parameter.label: Degrade time [ms]
parameter.description: Determine time in off-scan before next connection attempt.

parameter.name: discardCommand
parameter.label: Discard command of offline device
parameter.description: If is set to true, commands for offline device will be discarded.

parameter.name: syncCommand
parameter.label: Discard command of offline device
parameter.description: If is set to true, previously published commands will be resent to the device.

thing-type.label: SimpleBinary Thing
thing-type.description:
Generic SimpleBinary thing.
Thing requires bridge to be defined. Each thing is created from user defined channels. Many things can be assigned to one device (specified by address). Similarly, one thing can be formed by channels from different devices.
